WorkItem.Description:
In reference to this item:
 
Is it possible to Minimize to tray? : 
http://getsatisfaction.com/arkanesystems/topics/is_it_possible_to_minimize_to_tray
 
I would like to request a "Minimize to System Tray" feature for the next version.  Perhaps this code could be utilized:
 
Adding a 'Minimize to tray'-button to a Form's caption bar - CodeProject® : 
http://www.codeproject.com/KB/cs/mintraybtn.aspx
